name: Sewer Skater
description:
Sewer Skater is a simple downhill Jam.

This is my first game, and most of it is rubbish. However my goal was to complete a simple game and I'm very happy today to be finished.

Eventually I plan to make a much better skating game, but I'm putting this up for my friends and fam to see and play. Any donations will help me acquire better assets and resources. I know I can build something much better, it just takes time (which is a valuable resource) and any donations will further that cause :)

I hope you get a laugh or too out of how bad some of it is!
